commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Hey, Umi? Do you have any interest in aqua courses?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Aqua courses? Those obstacle courses with slides and things they put in pools or the beach? I think they sound like fun, but why the sudden question?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: One of my father's friends works for a tourist agency. They're setting up a huge aqua course for their next event, so he suggested I bring some friends along.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: What a lovely invitation! I would love to go! Let's ask Honoka and the others right away, too.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Ah, please excuse me. Hello? It's been a while since we last spoke, Karin. What's the matter?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Long time no speak, Umi. Remember when your club and mine had practice together? We all were wanting to get together again.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Really? We'd be more than happy to! Let's discuss when we-- Oh, wait just a moment.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Maki, what are your thoughts on inviting all of the Nijigasaki girls to the aqua course as well?

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: The Nijigasaki girls? Sure, why not? The more the merrier.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Thank you very much. Sorry to keep you waiting, Karin. We were actually thinking...

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I sure hope all of the Nijigasaki girls can join us at the aqua course. Honoka and the others also said they would check their schedules, too.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: I can see it being a real ruckus if all of us show up, though.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hey! Umi! Maki!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Huh?! Wha?! You?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I haven't seen you in so long! What are you doing here?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I was at a high-diving competition in Tokyo! I'm heading back home now, though! But wow, who woulda thunk I'd run into you two here?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: It truly is remarkable. Oh, while I've got you here, You, if you're free...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: ...μ's and the Nijigasaki girls are gonna go try out an aqua course. Would Aqours want to come too?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Oh, Maki! It's just as she said. Are you interested, You?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: An aqua course? Oh, I totally wanna go! It sounds like so much fun! Yay, I'm so stoked! I'll ask Chika and the others, too!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Please do!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Umi! Maki!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Sup! Short time no see!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Good morning, Hanamaru and You. Just the two of you from Aqours, I presume?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yup. Everyone else already had other plans, so... Sorry.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Don't be! I'm glad you're here all the same. Umi and I are the only ones free from our group too.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Oh? Are we the last ones to arrive?

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Good morning. Thank you very much for your kind invitation today.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: So, from Nijigasaki we have Karin and Shizuku. If everyone is here, let's head on over!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Aye aye!
